name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
r1: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 12%.
r2: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 15%.
r3: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 18%.
r4: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 21%.
r5: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 24%.
